allow:
Bash("c:\\Users\\juanT\\Documents\\programacion\\agentic_system_template\\monitoring\\prometheus.yml" << 'EOF'
global:
  scrape_interval: 15s
  evaluation_interval: 15s

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'orchestrator'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['orchestrator:8081']
    metrics_path: /metrics
EOF)

Bash(/c/Users/juanT/Documents/programacion/agentic_system_template/monitoring/prometheus.yml << 'EOF'
global:
  scrape_interval: 15s
  evaluation_interval: 15s

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'orchestrator'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['orchestrator:8081']
    metrics_path: /metrics
EOF)

Bash(/c/Users/juanT/Documents/programacion/agentic_system_template/monitoring/grafana/provisioning/datasources/datasource.yml << 'EOF'
apiVersion: 1

datasources:
  - name: Prometheus
    type: prometheus
    access: proxy
    url: http://prometheus:9090
    isDefault: true
    editable: true
EOF)

Bash(/c/Users/juanT/Documents/programacion/agentic_system_template/monitoring/grafana/provisioning/dashboards/dashboard.yml << 'EOF'
apiVersion: 1

providers:
  - name: 'default'
    orgId: 1
    folder: ''
    type: file
    disableDeletion: false
    editable: true
    options:
      path: /var/lib/grafana/dashboards
      foldersFromFilesStructure: false
EOF)
